transArray.content: It's very good, especially the breakfast is very rich and the price/performance ratio is very good. We will also be given earplugs during the renovation of the lobby, which is very considerate.

There is a kind of meeting in a sea of ​​millions of people. Just one glance is the communication between the eyes and the soul. The hotel lobby has been recently renovated and upgraded. The hotel entrance has been changed to a side door. The front desk has prepared earplugs and other supplies for all guests. We will try our best to provide you with a comfortable stay. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused to you. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your every visit and wish you a happy mood, peace and joy.
